title: Teemo still disabled?
body: As a Teemo main, like many others, when will the chosen one be back? How long does it take to fix a minor bug like this? Can we please get an ETA?

replies.body:
To fix a bug means that you have to make sure that the "fix" won't cause problems in other areas.

Teemo was able to go invisible in between autoattacks when he was attacking from brush and at intervals he could recall stealthed after he attacked something which was quite broken. Wish they'd never touched it though, because it felt so natural given the theme of champion. But what am I talking about? This is the same balance team that lets {{champion:157}} to remain broken for ages. Riot's golden child.

On the other hand {{champion:17}} is the mascott that nobody gives a damn about and is being mocked. So there you have it. I'd say it'll take probably 2-3 more days for them to fix the bug. Remember zz'rot portal? It was disabled for like how long, a month?
Thats kinda sad that teemo is disabled for that long... I expected him to get fixed to this day. Now i cant really play any other lane then mid
The day i buy the chroma for {{champion:17}} is the day he got disabled... 6 days for me (Aus) and counting and he still isn't fixed? wtf...
This is getting dumb lol
It's now the 5th day without {{champion:17}}  and I feel like... dying!{{summoner:3}}
Thursday evening he was disabled, now 4 days later he still is? COME ON RIOT!
This is ridiculous. The problem should have been fixed by now. Four days without my favorite champion. A nightmare.

I am sorry, what the hell is going on? Teemo is the sole reason i play League of Legends. Only champion i enjoy. For four days now he is disabled. Are you serious? Fix this issue asap plz or else i will install Dota 2 and you will never see me again as a customer. You have so many programmers, there are no excuses.
Why doesn't this get fixed before the weekend? Champs disabled for long periods of time is really weak.
The one time I want to play teemo..
What happened that was so drastic that he had to be disabled?
He had a bug which made him go invisible almost immediately when entering  bush, it could also happen in combat.
Wow  I main teemo also & I never had this happen
im not a teemo main but i experienced the bug. It made me invisible, even if i was teleporting back to base
me either.  I havent played anyone but Teemo this season in ranked...i'm stuck playing in horrid normals until his return

Hello

I have spent quit a bit of money on my favourite Champ Teemo and the he go just disable it for the hull weekend. I`m really unhappy with this situation and is that how you thank you payed costumer then  I will tell you that is the last time I done it....

Some kind of compensation for that who payed for him and his skins would be a minimum you could do after blocking him for the hull weekend.

hope to get an answer back or teemo released out of his prison.

best wishes

Napoleon

I don't have any additional information or ETA's to provide beyond what's posted in our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Bookmark that page for news, and hang on until he's back!

Your server status page is woefully inadequate. It is suitable for server maintenance, but lacks information about issues like disabled game features. I'm not asking for up-to-the-minute updates, but perhaps a daily notice letting players know that you have found the problem, or have a team of people working on it, or that you care at all about the missing game feature. 
"We are currently working on a resolution" is something I've heard from government, and they can take months or years to fix simple problems. Sometimes the players get the impression that the game programmers/troubleshooters just pick and choose what they want to work on on a whim. Improved communications would be greatly appreciated by me and most likely the rest of the community as well.

posting this comment on sunday, but the fact he has been disabled since thursday is pretty annoying. All other champions seem to get their bugs fixed within 24 hours, sometimes I have even seen them enable a champion before my Gaming period is done. It is really annoying for those of us who have weekends off only to find our champ we play to win games is disabled because it is taking much longer than other champions to fix the bug, and feels bad that we have to choose not to play, or not play at our best.{{champion:17}}
Yeah.  The "Teemo has been disabled" status post has been removed from status.leagueoflegends.com/#na  any reason other than annoy players?
'cause he's still disabled in game
Why even play league if you can't play as {{champion:17}}
I want my teemo back. Do you know how much money I spended on him? I spended more then $600 on him. I want my temp back. Please give him back to me. I don't know how to play other champions
Riot Free My Boii Teemo ;-;

As usual, Teemo is the champion that get the least love. While every champions disabled get fixed in a few hours, Riot don't even bother fixing Teemo days after disabling it. It's just like the fact that Teemo is one of the weakest champions and has never been strengthened and the fact that you almost never see any work done on this character during patches. Riots has just decided that it hated this champion and doesn't even bother making it available to players.

You should work for the goverment 

Riot 2012 - "We are gonna release a onetime limited skin and he is definitely never come back to the store"  - 4 years later you literally fucked everyone who has bought that skin right in the ass

Riot 2014 - "We are working on a rework for urgot" - 3 years nothing happend

I guess it will take a few months and then they are gonna release teemo + nerf 


Everyone who buys skins in this game is getting fucked by riot - when you see a champion is getting buffed you can asume that in the near future he will get a skin and when the skin is released they nerf that champion to oblivion or changed it drastically that i dont even want to play them anymore. (ryze, nidalee, cassio, sion and many other champions that got nerfed pretty hard)

EDIT : and my name is Fµcked by Riòt not fmcked
